thread.title: Pentagon chief to protect funds for cyber, space, electronic warfare
thread.title_full: Pentagon chief to protect funds for cyber, space, electronic warfare

title: Pentagon chief to protect funds for cyber, space, electronic warfare
text:
10 Pentagon chief to protect funds for cyber, space, electronic warfare 
Reuters: U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter on Wednesday vowed to invest aggressively in innovative research programs and protect funding for new space, cyber and electronic warfare weapons, despite what he called a "terribly disgraceful era of budget turmoil."Carter told a conference sponsored by DARPA, the Pentagon's research arm, that the investments were necessary given rapid technology developments by China and Russia that have started to eroded the U.S. military's competitive edge.
